name: “Configure” button redirects to the plugin’s config page in System Console

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Update notes: Linda 20 Jun 2022: Adding RF test: MM-T4023 MM-T1987 System admin can install and configure plugin from Marketplace

inline.description:
“Configure” button redirects to the plugin’s config page in System Console
————————————————————————————
1. Launch Plugins Marketplace.
2. In “All Plugins” tab, click on the “Configure” button beside Github plugin.
inline.expectedResult: The user is redirected to the configuration page of Github plugin in System Console.
